metadata.title: USN-3969-1 -- wpa_supplicant and hostapd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that wpa_supplicant and hostapd incorrectly handled unexpected fragments when using EAP-pwd. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3969-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  hostapd - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.3 wpagui - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.3 wpasupplicant-udeb - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.3 wpasupplicant - 2:2.6-15ubuntu2.3 No subscription required
